column4: Hi, I want to do a small upgrade to my video card as it's quite old and not well supported under linux. I currently have an ati 9200SE. I'm wondering if somebody can recommend a cheap card that they've found the binary drivers work well for.
oh, I only have an agp slot, not pci-e
yoooder: not much power. I want direct rendering to be enabled and I've had trouble with the ati binary drivers.
Well, that depends. it performs far better 3D wise, but you need non-open drivers.
